NPCs.Name: Matt
NPCs.Description: A wise Matt with a long beard who lives in a cozy log cabin.
NPCs.InitialDescription: Matt stands here, ready to greet visitors at his log cabin.
NPCs.Dialogue: Thank you for bringing me this potion! I feel much better now. Please take this as a token of my gratitude.

NPCs.Name: Professor Jon
NPCs.InitialDescription: Professor Jon is here, ready to give you your first Pals!
NPCs.Dialogue: Welcome to the world of Pals! Here, take this Paldex and choose your starter.

NPCs.Name: Nurse Noelia
NPCs.Description: A kind nurse who cares for all Pals and their trainers.
NPCs.InitialDescription: Nurse Noelia stands behind the counter, ready to help heal your Pals.
NPCs.Dialogue: Hello, I'm Nurse Noelia! Let me heal your Pals to full health. I also have a favor to ask: could you deliver this potion to Matt at the Log Cabin?
